Interface Access

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessImpl

    public interface Access
    Validate permissions based on URIs for agents, objects and rights.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check(String agentUri, String documentUri, Permission permission)
      Check if a given agent for a given document or stream has the right permission.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        boolean check(String agentUri,
            String documentUri,
            Permission permission)
        Check if a given agent for a given document or stream has the right permission.
        Parameters:
        agentUri - URI of a given user or group
        documentUri - URI of a stream
        permission - the permission level

                      throws AccessManagementException
        Refresh the in-memory permission information from storage.

        AccessManagementException
